name: Nexa AI Trading Terminal
description: NEXA is a crypto trading terminal designed to support both manual and automated trading strategies. It offers AI-powered algorithms for market analysis, smart order execution, and predictive trade signals. The platform includes features such as real-time phone alerts, a smart scanner for identifying high-potential memecoins, and a user-friendly interface tailored for data-driven decision-making. NEXA aims to streamline the trading process by combining advanced analytics with intuitive tools for retail and professional traders.
